009
010package imagingbook.pub.color.image;
011
012
013public class XYZscalingAdaptation implements ChromaticAdaptation {
014        
015        private final double[] W21;
016
017        public XYZscalingAdaptation(double[] W1, double[] W2) {
018                W21 = new double[3];
019                for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
020                        W21[i] = W2[i] / W1[i];
021                }
022        }
023        
024        public XYZscalingAdaptation(Illuminant illum1, Illuminant illum2) {
025                this(illum1.getXYZ(), illum2.getXYZ());
026        }
027
028        @Override
029        public float[] applyTo(float[] XYZ1) {
030                final float[] XYZ2 = new float[3];
031                for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
032                        XYZ2[i] = (float) (XYZ1[i] * W21[i]);
033                }
034                return XYZ2;
035        }
036
037}
